segments.text: Good morning , sir . Can I see your boarding pass , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , sir . This is your passport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Ugh ... Is there any difference ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . As a matter of fact , you can't board the plane without boarding pass .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gee . I must have left it in my hotel room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry sir . I can't let you pass .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But when does the plane take off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ugh , in about thirty minutes , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God ! What do I do now ? Bone head .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Calm down , sir . You are creating a commotion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank God . Thank you , I'll be right back .
segments.speaker: S2
